properties.title: Architecture
properties.description: Places that showcase architecture in Nantes, such as the Château des ducs de Bretagne, Notre-Dame Cathedral and Passage Pommeraye.

properties.title: Historic Sites
properties.description: Historic sites in Nantes, such as the Château des ducs de Bretagne and Place Royale.

properties.title: Museums and History
properties.description: Museums and historical sites in Nantes, such as the Musée d'Histoire de Nantes and the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre et Saint-Paul.

properties.title: Shopping and Entertainment
properties.description: Places for shopping and entertainment in Nantes, such as the Passage Pommeraye and Les Machines de l'île.

properties.title: Outdoor Activities
properties.description: Places for outdoor activities in Nantes, such as the Parc des Tramways and the Parc des Chantiers.

properties.title: Art and Culture
properties.description: Places related to art and culture in Nantes, such as the Musée des Beaux-Arts and the Musée Jules Verne.

properties.title: Parks and Gardens
properties.description: Parks and gardens in Nantes, such as the Parc des Chantiers and the Jardin des Plantes.
